Title: When the Levee Breaks
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Marguerite MacIntyre, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Charlie Charbonneau (executive story editor)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Setting the stage for a bloody showdown, Dahlia gives Klaus and Hayley a deadline to turn over baby Hope. Elijah attempts to convince Klaus that they need to work together in their fight ...
